scripts.prepare: python3 python-scripts/img-converter.py && python3 python-scripts/img-resizer.py && python3 python-scripts/get-dir.py
scripts.host: rm -rf ../../FirebasePhoto/public/* && cp -r .output/public/* ../../FirebasePhoto/public/ && npm run statfile && cd ../../FirebasePhoto && firebase deploy --only hosting && cd ../GIT/photo-gallery
scripts.full: npm run prepare && npm run build && npm run host
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "fix" && git push
scripts.update: npm run prepare && rm -rf .output/public/assets && cp -r public/assets .output/public/assets && rm -rf .output/public/images && cp -r public/images .output/public && npm run host
